item.description: Hier, le Premier ministre a clairement fait savoir qu'une intervention militaire était nécessaire en #Syrie. Que-ce que vous en pensez?

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: (2/2)...Le gvt conservateur doit aider les réfugiés & faciliter la réunification des familles. Signez la pétition: http://t.co/ilJDDqJ4eu

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Le gvt féd s'est engagé à accueillir jusqu'à 1300 réfugiés syriens. Pourtant, ns avons slm accueilli 9 réfugiés depuis le début de 2013(1/2)

item.title: Posted on Twitter

item.title: Mentioned by The Province
item.description:
Federal MPs get 'digital makeovers'
“It's not uncommon to hear a variety of different viewpoints from citizens and groups on what you should do, or what you should not do, as a member of parliament. However, Mark's points were very unique,” Albas said. The British Columbia MP said he is ... For instance, 22-year-old NDP MP Laurin Liu got bonus points on her otherwise “disappointing” use of digital media because she might still be learning the political ropes. He also rewards the unique and interesting. That's where Trudeau got kudos for posting a ...
